summary.description:
Today, cooler for the feels like temperature (down 5.6°C) and outside temperature (down 4.6°C), more moisture-laden outside humidity (up 8%), and drier conditions in rainfall (down 0.4 mm).

Compared to today, yesterday also had noticeable differences in cloud levels (up 645 m).

The past week and month had observable variation in cloud levels (up 1595 m), feels like temperature (up 7.5°C), outside temperature (up 6.2°C), and dew point temperature (up 2.8°C) when compared to today.

cloud levels.description:
Today’s average cloud levels is 645.2m lower than yesterday, 609.0m lower than the past week, 1595.0m lower than the past month.

The cloud levels yesterday fell between 1059m minimum and 3380m maximum, with an average of 1079.0m; weekly and monthly averages were marginally higher at 1688.0m and 2670m.
